manipulators.description: Hyper + f opens default Application Launcher
Hyper + d in Alacritty sends EOF
Hyper + u in Alacritty/Obsidian move one tab left
Hyper + i in Alacritty/Obsidian move one tab right
Hyper + [ in Alacritty move one pane left
Hyper + ] in Alacritty move one pane right
Hyper + u in iTerm move one tab left
Hyper + i in iTerm move one tab right
Hyper + [ in iTerm moves one pane left
Hyper + ] in iTerm moves one pane right
Hyper + d in iTerm sends EOF
Hyper + m move one space right
Hyper + n move one space left
Hyper + u in Signal moves up
Hyper + i in signal moves down
Hyper + u move one tab left
Hyper + i move one tab right
